Html:
Hello All

When i use phpexcel to read image ,and can save the image to my directory,but use the same way to save the chart info,and can't see something,

 

please help me.

 

Thank you!

 

Steven
Charts aren't regular images; but the latest SVN code can read chart data from Excel 2007 files, and that can be rendered as an image using the jpgraph library.
